|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6KB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot; |stockos = Linux;3.10.14;OpenWrt (MediaTek SDK);
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe, Micro SD card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, debug |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/18/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 25 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = ZBT WN2522 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ZBT-WE826_B0" and "ZBT-WN2522" is silkscreened on the board.
===Key features=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek_MT7620A|MT7620A]] @580MHz (RevID: 0206) *RAM: 128MB (DDR2), Flash: 16MB (SPI NOR) *2.4GHz Wi-Fi (supports 802.11bgn, up to 300Mbps) *Optional 5GHz Wi-Fi (supports 802.11abgn/ac, up to 867Mbps) *1x USB 2.0, 1x microSD, 1x Mini PCIe *4-pins serial debug port header
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/zbt/we-826 ''ZBT WE826'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.cebit.de/product/zbt-we826/2040372/L364619 ''ZBT-WE826'' on '''CeBIT'''] <small> '''Note''': Original device is coming with empty mpci-e slot but can be supplied with MT7612E ::radio card or 3G/4G modem card (SIM Card slot soldered on PCB bottom). </small>
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zbt/zbt_we826t_32m |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/zbtlink/we-826 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=62347 |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.0 }} Please insert instructions here
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:826 board top.jpeg| Board top File:826 board bottom.jpeg| Board bottom File:826 with 5g card.jpeg| With 5G MT7612E card installed File:826 5g card close.jpeg| 5G card close </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==Hardware Modification== :This board uses [http://elinux.org/images/e/ee/FE11-datasheet.pdf FE1.1s USB 2.0 HUB] (4 ports) chip providing :front USB port and MiniPCIe usb interface (for 3G/4G modem). :2 other ports are free and can be used for hardware mods.
==See also== *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/we126.html ZBT WE126] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, USB 2.0, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/WE526.html ZBT WE526] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE826T.html ZBT WE826T] MediaTek MT7620A @580MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 128MB, USB 2.0, 2.4MHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE, 3G/4G *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/WE1026.html ZBT WE1026] MediaTek MT7620A @580MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 128MB, USB 2.0, 2.4MHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/ZBT-WE1426.html ZBT WE1426] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 4MB, RAM: 32MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE1626.html ZBT WE1626] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE1826.html ZBT WE1826] MediaTek MT7620A @580MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 128MB, USB 2.0, 2.4/5GHz, 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WE2026.html ZBT WE2026] MediaTek MT7620N @580MHz :Flash: 8MB, RAM: 64MB, 2.4GHz, 802.11bgn 2T2R, 5x FE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/ZBT-WG2626.html ZBT WG2626] MediaTek MT7621AT @880MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 512MB, USB 3.0, 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R, 5x GbE *[http://www.zbtlink.com/products/router/ZBT-WG2926.html ZBT WG2926] MediaTek MT7621AT @880MHz :Flash: 16MB, RAM: 512MB, USB 3.0, SATA, 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R, 5x GbE
